title.narrative: CHILD PROTECTION AND GBV SERVICES TOOLS

description.narrative: By 2018, improved procedures and guidelines are in place for Government and CSOs to provide better services to vulnerable girls, boys and their families, which contributes to Access To Justice, Child Protection Systems, Child Protection â€“ Strengthen Families And Communities, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children, Violence, Exploitation And Abuse. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By the end of 2018, more vulnerable individuals and families demand for, and benefit from integrated child protection and justice services.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2018, improved procedures and guidelines are in place for Government and CSOs to provide better services to vulnerable girls, boys and their families

description.narrative: In close collaboration with Government partners, multi-sectoral guidelines and tools were developed that support professionals to deliver better integrated, quality child protection services that protect children from violence, including from online abuse. | Status:Met | As-of Date:30/12/2018
